page.title: 12EDUCATION:CARMEL COLLEGE
page.content: Compulsory Jewish studies form a part of the{curriculum at Carmel College} pupils learn Hebrew,and a knowledge of Jewish law,customs and history. Interested pupils can progress through o-level and talmudic studuies to a specially designed A-level syllabus modern hebrew is offered as an option, although this is treated as a language seperate from the Jewish Studies dpartment. In the grounds there is a modenistic {synagogue}which contains interesting stained glass.Helped by pupils,the Israeli artist Azaz designed this so that shards of coloured glass are pressed between plate glass.
